itinerary.title: "Discover Paris: City of Lights Adventure"
itinerary.description:
Paris, the capital city of France, is located in the Île-de-France region in the north-central part of the country. Known as "The City of Light" (La Ville Lumière), Paris is renowned for its rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant culture. The city is a global center for art, fashion, gastronomy, and culture, attracting millions of tourists each year.

One of the most iconic landmarks in Paris is the Eiffel Tower, a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars, which has become a symbol of France and is one of the most recognizable structures in the world. Another architectural masterpiece is the Notre-Dame Cathedral, a stunning example of French Gothic architecture, famous for its intricate sculptures and gargoyles.

Paris is also home to the Louvre Museum, the world's largest art museum and a historic monument in Paris. The museum houses thousands of works of art, including the Mona Lisa and the Venus de Milo. The Musée d'Orsay, located in a former railway station, is another major museum, known for its extensive collection of Impressionist and Post-Impressionist masterpieces.

The city is famous for its charming neighborhoods, such as Montmartre, known for its bohemian past and the Basilica of the Sacré-Cœur, and the Latin Quarter, with its lively atmosphere and historic universities. The Seine River, which flows through the heart of the city, offers picturesque views and is lined with beautiful bridges and quays.

Paris is also a fashion capital, hosting prestigious events like Paris Fashion Week and housing the headquarters of luxury brands such as Chanel, Louis Vuitton, and Dior. The city's culinary scene is equally renowned, with a plethora of Michelin-starred restaurants, quaint cafés, and patisseries offering exquisite French cuisine and pastries.

In addition to its cultural and historical significance, Paris is known for its vibrant nightlife, with a wide array of bars, clubs, and entertainment venues. The city's parks and gardens, such as the Luxembourg Gardens and the Tuileries Garden, provide serene escapes from the bustling urban environment.

Overall, Paris is a city that seamlessly blends the old with the new, offering a unique and enchanting experience to all who visit. Its timeless beauty, artistic heritage, and romantic ambiance make it one of the most beloved cities in the world.

description_and_budget.day_description: We begin our unforgettable journey in Paris by arriving from Singapore after a long flight. Remember to pack comfortable walking shoes, weather-appropriate clothing, a universal adapter, travel documents, and extra batteries or chargers to stay fully prepared.

activities.title: Flight to Paris
activities.description: This flight offers a convenient and comfortable journey from Singapore to Paris, allowing you to rest or plan your upcoming adventures. Enjoy onboard amenities and anticipate a memorable European experience upon arrival.

activities.title: Ride to Hotel
activities.description: Sit back and relax during this scenic transfer from Charles de Gaulle Airport to your chosen hotel near the Champs-Élysées, giving you a first glimpse of iconic Parisian streets and architecture.

activities.title: Hotel Checkin
activities.description: Settle into your Parisian accommodation in this elegant neighborhood, known for grand avenues and stylish shops. Use this time to freshen up, store your luggage, and orient yourself for the upcoming city explorations.

activities.title: Transit to Eiffel
activities.description: Travel by road from the Champs-Élysées area to the base of the Eiffel Tower, soaking in the ambiance of Parisian life along the way. This short ride sets the stage for an iconic visit.

activities.title: Eiffel Tower Visit
activities.description: Bask in the awe-inspiring grandeur of the Eiffel Tower, one of the world’s most recognizable landmarks. Admire panoramic city views from its observation decks, capturing memorable photos while savoring a quintessential Parisian experience.

activities.title: Ride to Montmartre
activities.description: Journey through Paris’s bright boulevards en route to Montmartre, soaking up the bohemian charm of this historic district. Keep an eye out for street art, quaint shops, and lively cafes along the way.

activities.title: Dinner in Montmartre
activities.description: Indulge in a charming dining experience in Montmartre, famous for its artistic heritage and romantic ambiance. Taste classic French dishes, engage with friendly locals, and relish the neighborhood’s distinctive ambiance under the evening lights.

activities.title: Return to Hotel
activities.description: Conclude your first evening in Paris with a comfortable drive back to your hotel. Reflect on the day’s vibrant cityscapes and savor the anticipation of further exploration in the upcoming days.

description_and_budget.day_description: Today, immerse yourself in Paris’s cultural and artistic highlights. Expect a day filled with world-class museums, historic landmarks, and a special evening concert. Each stop provides a deeper glimpse into the city’s timeless allure.

activities.title: Morning Ride
activities.description: Breathe in the crisp morning air as you journey from the elegant Champs-Élysées to the bustling Latin Quarter. Observe everyday Parisian life unfolding on sidewalks and terraces while anticipating a delightful breakfast ahead.

activities.title: Breakfast Delight
activities.description: Start your day with a delicious French breakfast, savoring pastries, coffee, and fresh produce that define Parisian cuisine. Embrace the lively atmosphere, fuel up for exploration, and let the local flavors invigorate your senses.

activities.title: Heading to Louvre
activities.description: Enjoy a brief trip across the Seine to the legendary Louvre Museum. Admire the storied buildings, centuries-old bridges, and scenic waterfront vistas, building anticipation for one of the world’s greatest art collections.

activities.title: Louvre Exploration
activities.description: Take your time exploring iconic masterpieces like the Mona Lisa and Venus de Milo within the Louvre’s vast galleries. Dive into centuries of art history, appreciating diverse styles and learning fascinating stories behind the collections.

activities.title: Journey to Notre-Dame
activities.description: Travel across central Paris to discover the historic Île de la Cité, home to the Notre-Dame Cathedral. Observe the city’s timeless architecture, bustling streets, and picturesque paths along the River Seine during this ride.

activities.title: Lunch by Notre-Dame
activities.description: Pause for a midday meal surrounded by centuries of history. Sample hearty French dishes or lighter fare, and soak in panoramic views of the cathedral’s Gothic silhouette, bridging past and present in extraordinary fashion.

activities.title: Transit to Tuileries
activities.description: Head along the Seine toward the Tuileries Garden, once part of a royal palace. Embrace the refined elegance of the cityscape, anticipating a restful escape and scenic green space in the heart of Paris.

activities.title: Tuileries Stroll
activities.description: Wander through the beautifully manicured Tuileries Garden, a serene haven in central Paris. Marvel at statues, fountains, and the delightful landscaping, capturing a glimpse of quintessential French horticulture and peaceful urban retreat.

activities.title: Short Ride to Marais
activities.description: Continue your exploration by traveling to Le Marais, famous for its historic mansions, trendy boutiques, and dynamic cultural scene. Enjoy glimpses of Paris’s architectural evolution and local life during this short commute.

activities.title: Concert in Le Marais
activities.description: Immerse yourself in a live musical performance showcasing Paris’s vibrant art and cultural heritage. From soulful melodies to energetic rhythms, this concert offers an unforgettable event, presenting a taste of the city’s creative flair.

activities.title: Ride to Latin Quarter
activities.description: Take a brief journey to the Latin Quarter, an area brimming with historical universities, literary cafés, and lively streets. Relax en route and reflect on the concert’s highlights as evening unfolds.

activities.title: Dinner in Latin Quarter
activities.description: Experience a spirited Parisian evening meal within this storied district, known for intellectual gatherings and diverse cuisines. Sample local specialties while enjoying lively conversation and a warm atmosphere steeped in centuries of tradition.

activities.title: Return to Hotel
activities.description: Wander through illuminated streets en route back to your hotel, recounting the day’s inspiring art, culture, and history. Cherish the final glimpses of evening Paris before resting for tomorrow’s final adventures.

description_and_budget.day_description: Enjoy your last day in the City of Light by visiting iconic monuments, indulging in renowned cafes, and preparing for your journey home. Reflect on memorable experiences that have shaped your Parisian adventure.

activities.title: Morning Ride to Café
activities.description: Bask in the morning glow as you travel from the Champs-Élysées to Café de Flore. Appreciate the passing architectural gems and authentic local energy, setting a relaxed tone for the day ahead.

activities.title: Parisian Breakfast
activities.description: Savor a quintessential French morning meal at the legendary Café de Flore. From freshly baked croissants to bold espresso, indulge in simple yet profound flavors that define the city’s celebrated café culture.

activities.title: Transit to Arc
activities.description: Travel briefly through Paris’s sophisticated streets to reach the Arc de Triomphe. This famed monument stands as a tribute to French history, offering a majestic vantage point and insight into national pride.

activities.title: Arc de Triomphe
activities.description: Stroll around and explore the commanding Arc de Triomphe, commemorating those who fought for France. Admire the detailed carvings, ascend for panoramic city views, and appreciate the grandeur of this historic site.

activities.title: Back to Hotel
activities.description: Make your way back through central Paris, noticing how daily life unfolds around grand avenues and prestigious stores. This short journey lets you savor the city’s magnetic energy before continuing your final day’s schedule.

activities.title: Hotel Checkout
activities.description: Complete the checkout process at your Champs-Élysées hotel, finalizing any remaining details for your stay. Take a moment to reorganize belongings and confirm travel arrangements, ensuring a smooth transition to the last Paris adventures.

activities.title: Transfer to Shops
activities.description: Travel a brief distance to the upscale boutiques along the Champs-Élysées. Admire gleaming storefronts, grand architecture, and a refined atmosphere that showcases Paris’s reputation for timeless fashion and luxury shopping experiences.

activities.title: Champs-Élysées Shopping
activities.description: Immerse yourself in the glamorous world of Parisian retail therapy. Peruse international designer brands, browse high-end department stores, and perhaps treat yourself to a souvenir or two that encapsulates your French adventure.

activities.title: Drive to Airport
activities.description: Conclude your city explorations as you depart for Charles de Gaulle Airport, reflecting on treasured moments gathered through Paris’s splendor. Watch the skyline recede and hold onto the unique memories crafted this trip.

activities.title: Airport Lunch
activities.description: Before your flight, indulge in a final French feast within the airport’s dining options. Relish in fresh ingredients, local specialties, and a comforting meal that reaffirms the country’s gastronomic reputation before saying farewell.

activities.title: Flight to Singapore
activities.description: Embark on your return journey from Paris to Singapore, reflecting on unforgettable sights, tastes, and cultural moments. Use this travel time to rest, plan future adventures, and appreciate the experiences gained from this trip.
